reviews.review: Muito bom recomendo mt o jg é mt bem feito e estou mt ancioso para o 3

Though the concept and plot may be a bit tough to understand, Portal 1 and its great sequel are great puzzle games that are basically a Must-Have on all steam accounts. With multiple mods and enhancers, the Portal series makes great time for puzzle fans, its not too hard nor too easy!
make sure to use your brain

I'll try to keep this paragraph short:

I've played this a time or three on my ol' 360.

It's a class SS sequel to a class S game.

Graphics: Great
Gameplay: Great
Difficulty: Moderate
Story: Great
Length: Great
Replayability: Moderate to Great depending on your likings.
Price: $9.99 are you kidding me BUY THIS NOW. 
Overall: Great


User created maps are available, co op is available, and completely separate from the single player campaign.


I think the cake.. was the portals we made along the way.

Portal 2 has enough positive reviews, you don't need to hear it from me too. But here I am anyways! The storyline and graphics are way better than Portal 1. There's a bunch of fun little things the devs put in like being able to steal office chairs or yeet turrets over balconies. The experience is just fun and whimsical.
Best game of all time thank you portal 2 for my life

My pick for best game of all time. The puzzles, the characters, the lore, the mechanics... everything about this game borders perfection. It took everything great about the already impressive Portal 1 and upped it to 10. No matter what type of games you play, do not miss out on Portal 2.

Un excellent puzzle game et une très bonne suite de l'original.

[h1]Он не обычный дурак. Он — продукт величайших умов целого поколения, старавшихся создать наиглупейшего дурака в мире. А ты поставила его управлять этим комплексом.[/h1]

[i]Достойное продолжение первой части, которое углубило игру, дав ей историю и дополнительные геймплейные возможности.
Для своего времени эта игра очень хороша, да и сейчас она не теряет актуальности.
Отличная физика, саркастичные реплики GLaDOS - всё на высоте, впрочем, как и сам сюжет.
Именно здесь обретает смысл поговорка: "Враг моего врага - мой друг". 
Игра затягивает так, что после прохождения не верится, что больше не встретишь этих персонажей. [/i]

[u]Определённо, 10 тестовых камер из 10.[/u]

One of the BEST game i've played on Steam. Unfortunately, there are several bugs. Most of them are minor, but there is one crashing your game too often to be playable. This one happened to mine. But without these problems, this is a really good game!

Gra pomimo swojej starośći dalej umie zaskakiwać, jeżeli weźmiemy pod opinię również fakt iż można tworzyć własne poziomy, ta gra staje sie idealnym wyborem dla osób dość kreatywnych, jeżeli spojrzeć na trudność to wykonają to nawet najmłodsi, jedyne co jest ważne w tym przypadku to czas reakcji oraz kreatywność, jeżeli spojrzymy na możliwość warsztatu steam, to osoby z dużą kreatywnością nie będą miały wyboru w spróbowaniu wszystkich opcji, nie ma odmówienia w tym przypadku.
